exploration_config.non_repetition_check: Evidence-first validation performed; no leaderboard content used.

trends.name: Adaptive Learning Progression
trends.description: Users abandon apps when progression moves too fast for individual skill level
trends.evidence: Fitness trainers report 'on-demand sessions tend to be too fast for beginners'; meditation apps split focus with guidance complexity

trends.name: Feature Minimalism Movement
trends.description: Users prefer simple, focused tools over complex feature-rich applications
trends.evidence: Users report 'tired of maintaining productivity tools rather than using them'; 'spent more time configuring than building habits'

trends.name: Value-Before-Payment Models
trends.description: Subscription apps fail when core value is hidden behind paywall
trends.evidence: 42.4% of users cite cost concerns; 'content behind paywall prevents habit formation before subscribing'

oversaturated: guided meditation apps with extensive libraries
underexplored: skill-building apps with personal pace adjustment

market_research.monetization_trends: Users willing to pay for apps that prove value through free core functionality before subscription commitment

app_ideas.name: BreathPace
app_ideas.signal_source: Meditation apps 'split focus between breath and voice guidance'; 'sessions too long for beginners'
app_ideas.description: Simple breathing exercise app that adapts session length and complexity based on user completion patterns, starting with 30-second exercises
app_ideas.target_user: Meditation beginners overwhelmed by complex guided apps
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Users report focus-splitting issues with guided meditation and abandoning practice due to unsustainable session length
app_ideas.differentiation: Audio-free visual breathing guidance with adaptive session length based on completion patterns
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Premium: extended session library, stress pattern analytics, Apple Health integration

pricing.trial_strategy: Free core breathing exercises; 7-day premium trial

app_ideas.name: MoveMicro
app_ideas.signal_source: Fitness apps 'too fast for beginners'; 'one-size-fits-all doesn't work'; users pause videos frequently
app_ideas.description: Micro-workout app with 2-5 minute exercises that adapts difficulty based on completion rate and user feedback
app_ideas.target_user: Fitness beginners intimidated by standard 20-30 minute workout apps
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Trainers observe on-demand sessions move too fast; users report generic programs don't match fitness levels
app_ideas.differentiation: Ultra-short workouts with real-time difficulty adaptation based on user feedback
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Premium: workout history analytics, equipment-free routine expansion, progress photo timeline

app_ideas.name: NoteFlow
app_ideas.signal_source: Users 'tired of maintaining productivity tools rather than using them'; 'difficulty deciding where content belongs'
app_ideas.description: Single-stream note-taking app that automatically organizes notes by temporal context without folders or tags
app_ideas.target_user: Knowledge workers frustrated with complex note organization systems
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Users report spending more time organizing than creating; decision fatigue about note placement reduces efficiency
core_loop: Add note with quick voice/text input
Link related notes with simple gesture
app_ideas.differentiation: Zero-organization note-taking with automatic temporal and contextual grouping
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Premium: unlimited notes, voice transcription, cross-device sync, export formats

pricing.trial_strategy: Free up to 100 notes; 10-day premium trial

app_ideas.name: HabitSimple
app_ideas.signal_source: Habit apps with 'too many bells and whistles'; users 'spent more time configuring than building habits'
app_ideas.description: Three-button habit tracker: did it, skipped it, forgot it. No setup, categories, or streaks - just daily completion tracking
app_ideas.target_user: People wanting to build simple daily habits without complex tracking systems
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Users report configuration complexity prevents actual habit formation; seeking simple tracking alternatives
app_ideas.differentiation: Absolutely minimal interface with no configuration, streaks, or categories
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Premium: habit pattern insights, gentle reminder notifications, data export

pricing.trial_strategy: Free up to 3 habits; 21-day premium trial

app_ideas.name: FocusTimer
app_ideas.signal_source: Productivity apps create 'decision fatigue'; users want 'simple rather than complex alternatives'
app_ideas.description: Single-purpose focus timer with three preset durations: 15, 25, or 45 minutes. No customization, just start and focus
app_ideas.target_user: Remote workers and students needing simple focus sessions without complex time management
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Users overwhelmed by productivity app options seek minimal alternatives; timer complexity reduces usage
core_loop: Tap start with optional background sound
Log session completion with simple rating
app_ideas.differentiation: Absolutely minimal Pomodoro-style timer with no customization or complexity
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Premium: focus session history, weekly focus patterns, ambient sound library

app_ideas.name: SleepWind
app_ideas.signal_source: Meditation apps 'too much talking'; users need 'simple rather than guided' sleep aids
app_ideas.description: Progressive sleep preparation app with 3-stage wind-down routine: dim lights reminder, device away, breathing countdown
app_ideas.target_user: People struggling with sleep hygiene who find sleep apps too complex or stimulating
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Sleep meditation apps over-stimulate with guidance; users seek simple wind-down structure
core_loop: Receive first wind-down reminder (30 min before)
app_ideas.differentiation: Structured wind-down process without audio content or complex sleep tracking
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Premium: custom wind-down timing, sleep pattern analysis, smart alarm

app_ideas.name: PhotoSnap
app_ideas.signal_source: Photo editing apps cause 'decision paralysis with numerous options'; beginners overwhelmed by filter choices
app_ideas.description: One-tap photo enhancement with single 'make better' button that applies contextual improvements without filter selection
app_ideas.target_user: Casual photographers overwhelmed by complex photo editing options
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Novice photographers experience decision paralysis with filter abundance; prefer simple enhancement
app_ideas.differentiation: Zero-decision photo enhancement with AI-powered contextual improvements
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Premium: unlimited enhancements, batch processing, high-resolution exports

app_ideas.name: WaterSimple
app_ideas.signal_source: Habit tracking apps 'too many features confuse beginners'; users want 'simple daily tracking'
app_ideas.description: Single-purpose water intake tracker with cup-size presets and daily goal visualization
app_ideas.target_user: People wanting to improve hydration without complex health tracking features
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Health apps overwhelm users with multiple metrics; simple hydration tracking requested frequently
core_loop: Select cup size from three presets
app_ideas.differentiation: Exclusively water tracking with no other health metrics or complexity
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Premium: hydration pattern analysis, smart reminder timing, Apple Health sync

app_ideas.name: BookMoment
app_ideas.signal_source: Reading apps 'too complex for simple tracking'; users want 'progress without overwhelming features'
app_ideas.description: Minimal reading tracker that captures single meaningful quote or moment from each reading session
app_ideas.target_user: Readers wanting to remember book insights without complex reading analytics
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Reading tracking apps overwhelm with statistics; users seek simple memory aids for meaningful content
core_loop: Save favorite quote or insight with quick note
app_ideas.differentiation: Focus on capturing meaningful reading moments rather than reading statistics
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Premium: unlimited books, quote sharing, reading pattern insights

pricing.trial_strategy: Free up to 5 books; 21-day premium trial

app_ideas.name: MealQuick
app_ideas.signal_source: Nutrition apps 'too complicated for simple meal planning'; users want 'quick meal ideas without complexity'
app_ideas.description: Simple meal suggestion app with 15-minute recipe database filtered by available ingredients and dietary preferences
app_ideas.target_user: Busy professionals needing quick, healthy meal ideas without complex meal planning
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Meal planning apps overwhelm with features; users seek simple recipe suggestions for quick cooking
core_loop: Input available ingredients from preset list
Choose recipe and start cooking timer
app_ideas.differentiation: Exclusively quick recipes (under 15 minutes) with minimal ingredient requirements
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Premium: expanded recipe database, shopping list generation, nutrition info
